approveExactToken(address,address,uint25.details: Sets `amount` allowance of `_spender` over the router's (this contract) tokens.

params._commitment: the note commitment, which is PedersenHash(nullifier + secret)
params.sender: the sender address (used in cases when the sender is not the caller e.g. zapper contract)

rescueTokens(address,address,uint256).details: Method to claim junk and accidentally sent tokens

params._fee: the token amount sent to relayer as fee
params._nullifierHash: hash of unique deposit nullifier to prevent double spends
params._proof: is a zkSNARK proof data, and input is an array of circuit public inputs `input` array
params._recipient: the recipient address to recieve the token
params._refund: the eth amount sent to recipient as gas
params._root: merkle root of all deposits in the contract

withdraw(address,bytes,bytes32,bytes32,a.notice: Withdraw a deposit from the contract. Relayer withdrawn should have different _relayer and _recipient addresses.
